content: I'll definitely check those out! Speaking of grand productions, I've been enjoying the PBS Great Performances series, which has been airing filmed productions of various Broadway shows. I watched the 2020 capture of Hamilton on January 2nd, 2022, and the 2019 capture of The King and I on February 20th, 2022. Do you have any recommendations for other filmed productions or live streams of musicals that I might enjoy?
